MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G41 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:15pm. Our emergency response team have arrived at the Forth Street substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:20pm on Monday, 08 February 2021
